title: BRIEF-Anita Britt Joins Board Of American Outdoor Brands Corp
text:
February 6, 2018 / 1:08 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Anita Britt Joins Board Of American Outdoor Brands Corp Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - American Outdoor Brands Corp: * ANITA BRITT JOINS BOARD OF AMERICAN OUTDOOR BRANDS CORP. 
* AMERICAN OUTDOOR BRANDS CORP - ‍INTENDS TO REDEEM ITS 5.000% SENIOR NOTES WITH A PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF $75 MILLION DUE IN 2018​ 
* AMERICAN OUTDOOR BRANDS CORP - ‍REDEMPTION PRICE WILL BE EQUAL TO 100.00% OF PRINCIPAL VALUE PLUS ACCRUED AND UNPAID INTEREST ON MARCH 8, 2018​ 
* AMERICAN OUTDOOR BRANDS CORP - ‍REDEMPTION IS CONDITIONED UPON CLOSING OF A NEW $75 MILLION NOTES OFFERING PRIOR TO REDEMPTION DATE​ 
* AMERICAN OUTDOOR BRANDS CORP - ‍NEW NOTES WILL HAVE NEARLY IDENTICAL TERMS AS REDEEMED NOTES BUT WITH AN EXPECTED MATURITY IN AUGUST 2020​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
